cast.overview: Recently paroled from prison, legendary burglar "Doc" Riedenschneider, with funding from Alonzo Emmerich, a crooked lawyer, gathers a small group of veteran criminals together in the Midwest for a big jewel heist.
cast.title: The Asphalt Jungle

cast.overview: An ex-thief is accused of enacting a new crime spree, so to clear his name he sets off to catch the new thief, who’s imitating his signature style.
cast.title: To Catch a Thief

details.biography: William "Wee Willie" Davis (1906–1981) was an American film actor. He had previously been a wrestler. He worked in the Jefferson County Jail in Louisville in 1972-75 as the gym guard. He  was also an engineer and contributed to the invention of the Glowmeter,  an early Heads up display that projected a cars speed onto the  windshield. A fellow wrestler, Prince Ilaki Ibn Ali Hassan (whose real  name was Agisilaki Mihalakis) who also fought as the Mad Greek was the  primary inventor.
details.name: William 'Wee Willie' Davis
